classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as retinoids. These are oxygenated derivatives of 3,7-dimethyl-1-(2,6,6-trimethylcyclohex-1-enyl)nona-1,3,5,7-tetraene and derivatives thereof.

category.category: Retinoids for Topical Use in Acne

atc-code.level: Retinoids for topical use in acne

drug-interaction.name: Orlistat
drug-interaction.description: Orlistat can cause a decrease in the absorption of Motretinide resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy.

drug-interaction.name: Diethylstilbestrol
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Diethylstilbestrol can be decreased when used in combination with Motretinide.

drug-interaction.name: Estradiol
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Estradiol can be decreased when used in combination with Motretinide.

drug-interaction.name: Vitamin A
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Vitamin A is combined with Motretinide.

drug-interaction.name: Valproic acid
drug-interaction.description: Valproic acid may increase the Pseudotumor Cerebri activities of Motretinide.

drug-interaction.name: Doxycycline
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of pseudotumor cerebri and elevated intracranial pressure can be increased when Motretinide is combined with Doxycycline.
